user.comment: Options: pro, max5x, max20x - Set this to your Claude subscription plan

weekly.comment: Weekly cost limits in USD for each plan tier. NOTE: pro and max5x limits are estimated/unverified - only max20x has been tested

limits.comment: Context limit (in thousands), cost limit per 5-hour session, token limit for tracking

paths.comment: Path to your Claude Code projects directory

display.comment: Display settings: progress bar length, lines to read from transcript, minutes for active session detection

colors.comment: ANSI color codes for statusline elements - customize to your preference

multi_layer.comment: Multipliers are automatically calculated: 100/threshold_range to fill bar at each threshold

sections.comment: Toggle visibility of statusline sections - set to false to hide any section

tracking.comment: Weekly tracking: 'ccusage' (default, uses ISO weeks) or 'ccusage_r' (optional, matches Anthropic console schedule). To use ccusage_r: set official_reset_date from your console's 'Resets [date/time]' (format: 2025-10-08T15:00:00-07:00 for 'Oct 8, 3pm Vancouver'). See README for setup guide.
